TopicTitle: Can this rocket land on the Mun?

Articles.Content:
Hi. I builded a rocket, it's fast, can make a orbit and escape kerbin. But can it land on the Mun?

[ATTACH]34242[/ATTACH]

If you mean escape kerbin's sphere of influence (i.e. go into orbit around the sun) then it's almost certainly capable of a mun landing.

You're using at least one mod on that craft (heat shield) so I can't check it.

Edited October 4, 2012 by EndlessWaves
